body_html:
I am not totally positive the license is the issue. I suspect the issue is the following and I hope to make sometime to dig in or get Smit to do it. :-)

  • Our build machine for normal builds has the .tgz install method and copied into /user/local/cuda or something like that or not and we depend on the ./configure hard coded dir structure.
  • Our Docker builds install with apt-get
body_text:
I am not totally positive the license is the issue.  I suspect the issue is the following and I hope to make sometime to dig in or get Smit to do it.  :-)

Our build machine for normal builds has the .tgz install method and copied into /user/local/cuda or something like that or not and we depend on the ./configure hard coded dir structure.
Our Docker builds install with apt-get
body:
I am not totally positive the license is the issue.  I suspect the issue is the following and I hope to make sometime to dig in or get Smit to do it.  :-)

-  Our build machine for normal builds has the .tgz install method and copied into /user/local/cuda or something like that or not and we depend on the ./configure hard coded dir structure.
-  Our Docker builds install with apt-get
